column6:
"SUPERGUARDIANS" Part 1 (of 2)!,2006,10
The Exiles find themselves in a world...without a world! The earth in this universe has been completely destroyed! And the creature responsible...the Silver Surfer!
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Tony Bedard | inker:Rick Magyar | penciller (cover):Paul Pelletier | colorist:Wil Quintana | letterer:Dave Sharpe
